name: web-webpack-plugin
description: web plugin for webpack, alternatives for html-webpack-plugin, use HTML as entry
author: gwuhaolin

scripts.demo:auto-plugin: cd demo/auto-plugin && rm -rf dist && rm -rf dist-js-prod && webpack && webpack -p --output-path dist-js-prod && cd ../../
scripts.demo:config-resource: cd demo/config-resource && rm -rf dist-js && rm -rf dist-js-prod && rm -rf dist-template && rm -rf dist &&  webpack && webpack --config webpack.config-template.js && webpack -p --output-path dist-js-prod && cd ../../
scripts.demo:out-html: cd demo/out-html && rm -rf dist && webpack && cd ../../
scripts.demo:use-template: cd demo/use-template && rm -rf dist && webpack && cd ../../
scripts.demo:watch-template: cd demo/watch-template && rm -rf dist && webpack -w && cd ../../
scripts.demo:extract-css: cd demo/extract-css && rm -rf dist && webpack && cd ../../
scripts.demo:public-path: cd demo/public-path && rm -rf dist  && webpack && cd ../../
scripts.demo:relative-path: cd demo/relative-path && rm -rf dist  && webpack && cd ../../
scripts.demo:relative-path-public-path: cd demo/relative-path-public-path && rm -rf dist  && webpack && cd ../../
scripts.demo:pre-post-entrys: cd demo/pre-post-entrys && rm -rf dist && webpack && cd ../../
scripts.demo:load-local-file: cd demo/load-local-file && rm -rf dist && rm -rf dist-prod && webpack && webpack -p --output-path dist-prod --config webpack-prod.config.js && cd ../../
scripts.demo: npm run demo:auto-plugin && npm run demo:config-resource && npm run demo:out-html && npm run demo:use-template && npm run demo:extract-css && npm run demo:public-path && npm run demo:pre-post-entrys && npm run demo:relative-path && npm run demo:relative-path-public-path && cd ../../
scripts.test: npm run demo && git ls-files -m demo
